message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small chunk, but I'm the one who's really taking the risk here!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more for my skills!
I'm willing to give you a small consolation prize, but I'm taking the lion's share this time!
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not going to be generous anymore, you're getting a tiny piece of the pie if you're lucky!
I'm making my final stand, meet me in the middle!
